ygData.subject: Re: Level 7
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I didn t have too bad of a problem with 11th level, but I was working Befallen 2nd floor a lot with five other guys.  It still took a long time because I
ygData.messageBody:
> -----Original Message-----
> From: TkAdam@... [mailto:TkAdam@...]
> Sent: Friday, April 23, 1999 9:37 AM
> To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
> Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] Re: Level 7

> Level 7 is very difficult, the pet is not very useful at that level.
>
> Level 11 was also rather difficult, though I was grouping so
> it was not too
> bad.
>

I didn't have too bad of a problem with 11th level, but I was
working Befallen 2nd floor a lot with five other guys. It still took a long
time because I died often, but it was better then camping at Lrodd or
attempting to work the West Commons.


> The bad thing is, Verant changed the pet spell. The rank 4
> (level 12) pet
> spell summons a pet that ranges from 8 to 12, not 11 to 13
> like it should...
> So you can STILL often get useless pets. (the last time I
> summoned I had to
> cast 6 times to get a pet that did not con green to me)
>

Oh yes, this was most surprising. At level 12 I rarely saw a white
conned skeleton, and now as 13 I rarely get a blue dangerous. This is
irritating as well because apparently your pet can only hit magically IF it
is of higher level than the monster it is hitting... thus your level 8-10
skeleton can't hit a level 11 wisp. Whoops!

Malark Zaren'Tul, Karana Server


> Sonoroud
